events.title: Summer Barbecue
events.description: Join us for our annual summer barbecue on the rooftop terrace.
events.fullContent:
The annual summer barbecue is back! We'll have a fully catered spread with grilled meats, fresh salads, and desserts. Drinks will be available from the bar.

Please RSVP so we can plan for numbers. Families and friends are welcome! The rooftop terrace offers stunning views, so bring your camera.

Weather backup: If it rains, we'll move to the Common Room.

events.title: Yoga in the Garden
events.description: Morning yoga session led by resident instructor.
events.fullContent:
Start your morning with a relaxing yoga session in our beautiful community garden. All levels welcome - from beginners to experienced practitioners.

Please bring your own mat and water bottle. The session will be led by Sarah, our certified yoga instructor who has been practicing for 10 years.

After the session, we'll have herbal tea and light refreshments.

events.title: Monthly Residents Meeting
events.description: Common room meeting to discuss community matters.
events.fullContent:
Join us for our monthly residents meeting where we'll discuss important community matters including:

- Budget update for Q1
- Upcoming maintenance schedule
- New amenity booking system
- Community feedback session

All residents are encouraged to attend. Light refreshments will be provided.
